item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Saturday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 81.

Saturday: N wind around 6 kt becoming ESE in the afternoon. Mostly sunny. Seas 1 ft or less.


This is as far west as i care to have an event especially being this close to New Haven.

The Plus location disclosed only at the event.


So its head out to the Islands that look interesting and if we want to paddle some more we can explore the river but its not all that nice compared to what you have seen recently..


WEATHER UPDATE:
http://www.usairnet.c...



Rasin Bran River, harbour, and some nearby islands..

(the tides were not in favor for us to ride the big waves at Great Island at this time..nor ride the surf at 4 mile river)

The after get together is my back yard in Wethersfield and POSSIBLY the "Best deal in town $5.99" Buff-A Nearby. (i eat about a pound of salmon and chicken..LOL)
(Or something healthy at my home ?)
This may be a good day to fill and turn on the bubble tub too for the remainder of a relaxing afternoon.


SINCE WE WILL BE DOWN BY THE SHORE AND MAY EXTEND OUR TIME THERE A LITTLE BIT,
I HAVE NO IDEA WHEN WE RETURN AND MOST LIKELY WILL GO AND EAT RIGHT AWAY..DONT KNOW YET ???


________________________________________________________________


GETTING THERE:
From Hartford, CT:

Take I-91 south to New Haven Area
(Stay far LEFT near this interchange to avoid the traffick somewhat)
Then merge onto
I- 95 NORTH interchange

Follow I- 95 NORTH for apx 4.5 miles to exit # 53 (Branford Connector)

Caution, i remember there being some construction in this area ( definatly right over the bridge) and don't know if this connector is or was involved, but just keep it in mind. They were working on bridges a few years now in these areas.

Take the connector to the end.

Take a RIGHT onto rte 1

Then an Immediate LEFT onto rte 142 = Short View Road

Take the 4 th left street = STANNARD Rd and go apx 0.75 miles to the boat ramp on LEFT

(Stannard changes into GOODSELL POINT RD near the boat launch,
Follow the boat ramp sings. the signs may be a bit different than the directions but i gave the least road changes..etc..




OR Just follow your GPS: and maps..
38 Goodsell Point Rd
Branford CT


xxxxxxxxxXxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
xxxxxxx
Kayaks available:

Paddle & Leash, Life Jacket with whistle is included with any of my yaks.

Dougnation of $ 20.00, bucks for my kayaks reserved for this particular event.
Its way less than what sport shops charge and the yaks & Paddles are top quality delivered and picked up at the site etc..

Please make sure you are familiar with the yak you choose and can fit in them since i don't have any wide yaks anymore.


I will only bring the yaks that are confirmed by a yes and by persons i have some familiarity with..

Maybee's obviously can't reserve any yaks and if ya reserve one and don't show up ya won't ever get a second chance to again.

Sorry i don't like to leave un-attended yaks on the trailer. They get stolen too easily.


IF USING MY YAKS YOU CANT LOOK LIKE A BONEHEADED BEGINNER AND STEP INTO THEM VIA THE FLOOR OR DRIVE UP ON SHORE WITH THEM LIKE YOU ARE GOING TO A DRIVE IN MOVIE. Only Novices in cheap plastic boats do that...

READ THE INFO ON THE FOLLOWING LINK: I will also show you the correct way and you will look like a intelligent seasoned pro and impress the others who don't know how. Or you may laugh at the ones that fall in who don't know how.
http://www.ehow.com/h...
Hint: always get out parallel to shore.

Please review the links below for the equipment specifications to be at least familiar with which boat or equipment you would be best suited for.

Cheap LIfe Jackets with a whistle is all i have for you since a GOOD QUALITY LIFE JACKET should be chosen for your particular body shapes and paddling style, and tight fit adjusted...if you have your own please bring it..
------------------
All my yaks come with Werner Carbon Kalliste Paddles (my recommended brand and type). Different lengths and types of the same version are in the bucket.

http://www.wernerpadd...

(No ya cant use these paddles for paddle float entry practice. i have some cheap ones for that.)-
------------------

Also for comfort is my favourtie Yak Pad optional accessory to all yaks on trips that we are actually going somewhere..

http://www.yakpads.co...


----------------------

BOW DECK BAGS are now placed on kayaks to hold water , accessories and other items needed for quick and easy access:

http://www.kayakprosh...

------------------------------

Eddyline Wind Dancer 18', Red, Rudder Equipped.
For almost any sized paddler apx (100 to 240 lbs) with Novice and up skills.

http://www.epinions.c...

highly stable (initial & secondary) comfortable Sea kayak, 18'=
---------- ---RESERVED FOR MELODY ---

---------------------------------

NDK Greenlander Pro 18', Red, Skeg Equipped.
Medium sized paddler (150-200 lbs) with Intermediate to Advanced skills.
12 Inch Butt Max width between hip pads..

http://www.atlanticka...

Fast Greenland style Sea kayak, moderated stability, 18'= ---AVAILABLE if you ready for it..--- ---al-r--.

----------------------------------

Necky Eliza Advanced Composite (Un Modified), Red and White, Skeg Version 15.25'.
Small to Medium sized paddler (100 - 175 lbs) with Beginner and up skills.
This is the medium size cockpit of the Eliza series.

http://www.belhavenca...

stable and predictable Transitional type Light weight (43 LB) Ladies Kayak, 15'3.0"=
---------- ----RESERVED FOR TRICE---

------------------------------------

Necky Eliza Composite Ultra Light Version (Very Thin Fiberglass and floor reinforced), Yellow, Skeg Version 15.25'.
Small to Medium sized paddler (100 - 175 lbs) with Beginner and up skills.
This is the lightest of the Eliza Series and also with the smallest cocpit.

http://www.belhavenca...

stable and predictable Transitional type Light weight (40 LB) Ladies Kayak, 15'3.0"=
-------- ----RESERVED FOR MARY --

-----------------------------------

Necky Eliza Plastic, Fire Color, Rudder Equipped 15.3'.
Small to Medium sized paddler (100 - 175 lbs) with Beginner and up skills.
This is the heaviest model and largest cockpit of the Eliza series.

http://www.neckykayak...

stable and predictable Transitional type moderate weight (50 LB) ladies kayak, 15'3.5"= -----AVAILABLE----- ---- ----

----------------------------------

Cedar Strip Night Heron by Guillemot Kayaks 18'

Greenland Paddle available also if desired.

Medium Sized Paddler (apx 150 - 220 Lbs) with beginner/intermediate and up skills.

http://www.guillemot-...

Overall a stable and predictable Sea kayak with Greenland style hull (45 lbs), 18' =
---------- ----RESERVED FOR KATE --



-----------------------------------------------------------------


Ok see some of you there.
al-r

item.name: KAYAKING @ BRANDFORD HARBOUR ISLANDS Plus X1J-- PIGOUT IN WETHERSFIELD
